homepage.aboutUsDesc: Roark Tools is the leader in dependable, durable and precise hydraulic and pneumatic torque tools. Decades of experience have helped us create industry leading tools that are accurate, affordable & built to last. We take pride in quickly delivering quality hydraulic and pneumatic torque tools at reasonable prices.
